item.title: Easy Guide to Social Media Marketing & Location
item.description: This easy guide to social media & location marketingwas something I published only to SlideShare – a new channel which has great potential for B2B digital marketing. This guide sums up key activities to get you started and is a bit of motivation that you can share with office colleagues. Key points include: Claim your Business on Foursquare Claim your Entry on Google Maps Create an Email Newsletter Create a Facebook Website Cross Promote using Twitter, Facebook and your website
